CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ope 2020/KER/544 Cr1.MC.No.8818 OF 2019(B) 2 Cril.MC.No.8818 OF 2019 ORDER The learned counsel for the petitioner seeks permission to withdraw the Crl.MC.
